**Abbreviations**

Major NLP venues
- ACL: Association for Computational Linguistics (https://2024.aclweb.org)
- EACL: European Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics (https://2024.eacl.org)
- EMNLP: Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (https://2024.emnlp.org)
- INLG: International Natural Language Generation Conference (https://inlg2024.github.io)
- NAACL: North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics (https://2024.naacl.org)

Major ML venues
- ICLR: International Conference on Learning Representations (https://iclr.cc)
- ICML: International Conference on Machine Learning (https://icml.cc)
- NeurIPS: Neural Information Processing Systems (https://neurips.cc)

Others
- COLM: Conference on Language Modeling (https://colmweb.org)
- DeepMath: Conference on the Mathematical Theory of Deep Neural Networks (https://deepmath-conference.com)

The above contains top venues in machine learning and natural language processing. 
As of 2023, using an arbitrary metric: 
- Top three venues in the ML community: ICLR, NeurIPS, ICML. 
- Top three venues in the NLP community: ACL, EMNLP, NAACL. 
See: 
(1) https://scholar.google.com/citations?view_op=top_venues&hl=en&vq=eng_artificialintelligence
(2) https://scholar.google.com/citations?view_op=top_venues&hl=en&vq=eng_computationallinguistics
